column4: can your programs move your file into a different place when changed?  That way all A has to do is move it into place, and B has to just check for its existence and then delete it when done.
I just notices inoticoming "trigger actions when files hit an incoming directory".  Sounds like what you were mentioning.
I was reminded of this story: http://thedailywtf.com/Articles/A-Problem-at-the-Personal-Level--More.aspx - the second story down.
